Package groupOne.game

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
groupOne.game.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy_Dog, Enemy_Guard, Player, S_Entity
public abstract class Entity extends Object
Abstract Class for the entities that will be created: Player and Enemy Contains various fields for position, speed, animations, direction, and collision detection

Necessary to create different kinds of entities without rewriting code several times over.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public BufferedImage setup(String imagePath)
      Returns a scaled image of the given input image. Utilizing the helper class to scale up the sprite before rendering.

      Parameters:
      imagePath - the name of the image

    • setAction

      public abstract void setAction()

    • update

      public void update()

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      void method that draws the player sprite with updates information. This method will be called in the GamePanel, so that the game components are rendered in the proper order.
